TOP_PORTS.title: TOP_PORTS
TOP_PORTS.description: Scan TOP_PORTS most common TCP ports. Defaults to 250.

MIN_VLSM_IPV4.title: MIN_VLSM_IPV4
MIN_VLSM_IPV4.description: Minimum variable-length subnet mask for IPv4-ranges. Defaults to 22. Use this value to prevent scanning large ranges.

MIN_VLSM_IPV6.title: MIN_VLSM_IPV6
MIN_VLSM_IPV6.description: Minimum variable-length subnet mask for IPv6-ranges. Defaults to 118. Use this value to prevent scanning large ranges.
